title: Something Perfect
lyrics:
I know I lie; I know I sin
I know I say I win
I'm looking for something perfect
And if I am, do I deserve it?

I'm looking for something perfect

I'm looking for something perfect



And when I cry, I'll cut the sting

I know I pay for it



I'm looking for something perfect

And if I am, would it be worth it?



I'm looking for something perfect

I'm looking for something perfect



I'm looking for something perfect

You're looking for something good
